oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Soldier's Prayer Book
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Soldier's Prayer Book published on June 13, 1861 belonging to Pvt. Joseph Goode, Co. E, 9th KY (US). An inscription on front page is addressed to William Richey, Goode's great grandson who served in WWII. Inscription reads: "Son this book formerly; belonged to your great grandfather Goode. He carried it during the Civil War which makes it about 85 years old or more. Granny wanted you to have it. Grandfather got home safely so lets hope and pray this book will be a good omen for you. Love, Mother"
